GBP/USD bulls making headway towards the 1.28 handle

USDJPY

USD/JPY dropped and broke below 110.90 and tumbled to 110.04, hitting the lowest intraday level since August 22. USD/JPY is expected to find support at 110.00, and a fall through could take it to the support level of 109.70. On the other side, resistance stands at 110.65, and a rise through could take it to the level of 111.00.

EURUSD

EUR/USD is in the optimistic up move trading higher above 1.1400. EUR/USD is expected to find support at 1.1400 and a fall through could take it further to the support level of 1.1350. On the other side, resistance stands at 1.1440, and a rise through could take it to the next resistance level of 1.1485.

GBPUSD

GBP/USD popped on Christmas Eve in European and US markets, rallying from a low of 1.2635 to a high of 1.2735. Support stands at 1.2700 and a fall through could take it to the next support level of 1.2600. On the other side, resistance stands at 1.2735, and a rise through could take it to the next resistance level of 1.2800.

GOLD

The precious metal continues the bullish sentiment trading at 1273 monthly highs. Gold is expected to find support at the level of 1,266.40 and a fall through could take it to 1,253.34 level. On the other side, resistance stands at 1,274.32, and a rise through could take it to the next resistance level of 1,280.00.
